title: Software Developer Intern - DNA/Zummit Infolabs
body:
• Built and shipped production full stack features using Next.js, Node.js, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS for customer and internal tools.

• Designed and implemented 15 plus REST API endpoints. Defined schemas and contracts. Reduced data fetch latency by 25 percent.

• Modeled relational databases with SQL via Prisma. Wrote optimized queries for core workflows.

• Developed 30 plus reusable UI components. Improved page load time by up to 700ms using SSR, CDN caching, and lazy loading.

• Participated in sprint planning, code reviews, testing, and technical documentation.
